Great Britain is just Scotland, England, Wales and Northern Ireland

"@Whatevs":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53d6cfe96368727908760000#post_53d6cfe96368727908760000
Why the hell is the world suddenly taking on all these draconian policies. Politician certain weren't like this years ago, in fact, they actually did their jobs properly to an extent back then. Some people can blame it all on 9/11 and the internet. But it's almost like humanity has suddenly lost all sense of responsibilities and decency, and taking on all the bad qualities of a human being.

Seriously, if there is a way to bring back the 80s and 90s' laid back mentality....

topics.body:
"I go across time!

I fly through the Sky!

For the Sake of this Planet!

Did you see that thing called love, Turn into a Bright Crimson Blaze?

In that Inky Black darkness, A Deadly force is awaiting!

To those who believe in Justice!

The Grand ruler of Truth!

To Keep on Dreaming for better days!

That is my Great Fantasy!

I love the feeling of being alive!

In these vast Azure Cosmos!

I go across time!

I fly through the Sky!

For the sake of this planet!

I burn Brightly!

I shed These Tears!

For the Sake Of our Tomorrows!

I'm Masked Rider Black!

I'm Masked Rider Black!":http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bs0aGn_CJis

It's shit, I know.
